snippet: Cincinnati Reds first baseman Joey Votto, pleased with the way his knee has handled the first two weeks of spring training, will play for Canada in the World Baseball Classic.
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati Reds first baseman Joey Votto, pleased with the way his knee has handled the first two weeks of spring training, will play for Canada in the World Baseball Classic.

headline.seo: Reds’ Joey Votto Will Play for Canada in World Baseball Classic
headline.main: Votto Will Play for Canada in World Baseball Classic
